comment.author: 39191857@N05
comment._content: Great mix of expressions on view.  Wonderful shot.  My mother-in-law would have been nine that year but she does not appear on this one.

comment.author: 30706821@N05
comment._content: Are there school photos available that the public can access? My grandmother Rose Boyle in the 1911 census is listed as assistant teacher living in Meenmore Dungloe Donegal.Her sister Annie Boyle is School Mistress. Would there be photos?

comment.author: 47290943@N03
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/30706821@N05] You could search our catalogue online, using search terms like Dungloe, etc.
comment.authorname: National Library of Ireland on The Commons
